I appreciate true professionalism.” </p> <p class="auther">Dimitri Vagarov</p> </div> </div> </div> </div> </div> </div> <style> @media screen and (min-width: 768px) { .slick-dots li.slick-active button { background: #d5c1ba!important; } .slick-dots li button { background: #d8d8d8!important; } .slick-next:before, .slick-prev:before { color: #d8d8d8!important; } .slick-dots li { background: #d8d8d8!important; } .slick-active { background: #d5c1ba!important; color: #d5c1ba!important; } } .slick-dots li.slick-active button { background: #d5c1ba!important; } .slick-dots li button { background: #d8d8d8; } .slick-next:before, .slick-prev:before { color: #d8d8d8; background: #d8d8d8; } .slick-dots li { color: #d8d8d8; background: #d8d8d8; } .slick-active { color: #d8d8d8; background: #d8d8d8; } /* .center .slick-center p { opacity: 1; -ms-transform: scale(1.08); transform: scale(1.08); } .center p { transition: all 0.3s ease; } */ .slider-container { max-width: 352px; font-family: Montserrat; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; letter-spacing: 0.005em; } .slider-container .card { width: 100%; } .slider-container .card .card-img { width: 64px; height: 64px; } .slider-container .card .card-img img { height: 64px; width: 64px; object-fit: cover; border-radius: 50%; } .slider-container .card .card-body { border: 1px solid #e8dbd3; box-sizing: border-box; border-radius: 8px; margin-top: -26px; margin-left: 36px; justify-content: center; } .slider-container .messag { margin: 25px 25px; } .slider-container .auther { font-family: Montserrat; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; letter-spacing: 0.005em; color: #808080; } </style>

item.title: nav bar
item.content: <div class="topnav" id="aboutus-nav"> <a id="about-us" class="aboutus" href="{{store%20url='about-us'}}">ABOUT US</a> <a id="our-shopping-platform" class="aboutus" href="{{store%20url='about-us/our-shopping-platform'}}">SHOPPING PLATFORM</a> <a id="design-own-jewellery" class="aboutus" href="{{store%20url='about-us/design-own-jewellery'}}">DESIGN OWN JEWELLERY</a> <a id="marketplace" class="aboutus" href="{{store%20url='about-us/marketplace'}}">MARKETPLACE</a> <a id="our-concierge-service" class="aboutus" href="{{store%20url='about-us/our-concierge-service'}}">CONCIERGE SERVICE</a> <a id="our-showroom" class="aboutus" href="{{store%20url='about-us/our-showroom'}}">OUR SHOWROOM</a></li> <a href="javascript:void(0);" class="icon" onclick="showAboutUsMenu()"> &#9660 </a> </div> <style> /* Add a black background color to the top navigation */ .about-us-nav{ background-color: #EAE0DD; margin-top: 25px; } .about-us-nav .topnav { background-color: #EAE0DD; font-family: 'Sans Serif Book FLF'; font-size: 14px; line-height: 22px; } .topnav { text-align:center; background-color: #EAE0DD; width: 100%; overflow: hidden; } /* Style the links inside the navigation bar */ .topnav a { float:none; display: inline-block; color: #808080; text-align: center; padding: 14px 16px; text-decoration: none; font-size: 17px; } /* Change the color of links on hover */ .topnav a:hover { color: black; } /* Add an active class to highlight the current page */ .topnav a.active { color: black; font-weight: 900!important; } /* Hide the link that should open and close the topnav on small screens */ .topnav .icon { display: none; } @media screen and (min-width: 280px){ .topnav a { padding: 12px 12px; font-size: 14px; } } /* When the screen is less than 600 pixels wide, hide all links, except for the first one ("Home"). Show the link that contains should open and close the topnav (.icon) */ @media screen and (max-width: 1080px) { .topnav a:not(.active) {display: none;} .topnav a.icon { float: right; display: block; } .about-us-nav{ margin-top: 16px; margin-left: 15px; margin-right: 15px; } } /* The "responsive" class is added to the topnav with JavaScript when the user clicks on the icon. This class makes the topnav look good on small screens (display the links vertically instead of horizontally) */ @media screen and (max-width: 1080px) { .topnav.responsive {position: relative; text-align: unset;} .topnav.responsive a.icon { position: absolute; right: 0; top: 0; } .topnav.responsive a { float: none; display: block; text-align: left; } } </style> <script> function showAboutUsMenu() { var x = document.getElementById("aboutus-nav"); if (x.className === "topnav") { x.className += " responsive"; } else { x.className = "topnav"; } } </script>

item.title: Size Guide
Delivery And Return
item.content:
Delivery

All orders shipped with UPS Express.

Always free shipping for orders over US $250.

All orders are shipped with a UPS tracking number.

Returns

Items returned within 14 days of their original shipment date in same as new condition will be eligible for a full refund or store credit.

Refunds will be charged back to the original form of payment used for purchase.

Customer is responsible for shipping charges when making returns and shipping/handling fees of original purchase is non-refundable.

All sale items are final purchases.

Help

Give us a shout if you have any other questions and/or concerns.

Email: [email protected]

Phone: +1 (23) 456 789
